item.title: Make A Powerful Terminal Workspace
item.description: I recently change my terminal setup from iTerm2 + Zsh + Tmux to Alacritty + Fish + Zellij. I found that my new combination is really Powerful. These tools are more flexible and high-degree customized is an important reason I keep them as well. However, the configuration is a time-consuming and frustration processing. You can click the header to download the related tool. All the tools are open source :rocket:

item.title: Configuration of macOS for development and research
item.description: 1. Introduction Configuration migration is time-consuming task so that I decide to write a blog to record the process. I will divide the configuration into two parts. In the first part, I will introduce the software I heavily use, and then share the configuration files in the second part. My newest device is MacBook Pro of M1 model, Here is a list of tools I use: I use Homebrew to install most software and how to install will be shown in every section.
